function.name: post_postproject
function.description:
Creates a new project under the organization.
# 
# In order to access this endpoint, the provided API key must have at least one of the following roles:
# - Organization Owner
# - Project Creator
# 
# To learn more, see [Organization, Project, and Database Access Overview](https://docs.couchbase.com/cloud/organizations/organization-projects-overview.html).
#

body.description: application/json: schema: type: object, required: name, properties: name: type: string, description: The name of the project (up to 128 characters)., maxLength: 128, example: My Project, description: type: string, description: A short description of the project (up to 256 characters)., maxLength: 256, example: My awesome project

organizationId.description: The GUID4 ID of the organization.

function.name: get_listprojects
function.description:
Lists all the projects under the organization.
# 
# In order to access this endpoint, the provided API key must have at least one of the following roles:
# - Organization Owner
# - Project Owner
# - Project Manager
# - Project Viewer
# - Database Data Reader/Writer
# - Database Data Reader
# 
# To learn more, see [Organization, Project, and Database Access Overview](https://docs.couchbase.com/cloud/organizations/organization-projects-overview.html).
#

organizationId.description: The GUID4 ID of the organization.

sortDirection.description: The order in which the items will be sorted.

sortBy.description: Sets the order of how you would like to sort the results and the key you would like to order by. Valid fields to sort the results are: **id**, **name**.

perPage.description: Sets the number of results you would like to have on each page.

page.description: Sets the page you would like to view.

function.name: get_getprojectbyid
function.description:
Fetches the details of the given project.
# 
# In order to access this endpoint, the provided API key must have at least one of the following roles:
# - Organization Owner
# - Project Owner
# - Project Manager
# - Project Viewer
# - Database Data Reader/Writer
# - Database Data Reader
# 
# To learn more, see [Organization, Project, and Database Access Overview](https://docs.couchbase.com/cloud/organizations/organization-projects-overview.html).
#

projectId.description: The GUID4 ID of the project.

organizationId.description: The GUID4 ID of the organization.

function.name: put_putproject
function.description:
Update project name and or project description.
# 
# In order to access this endpoint, the provided API key must have at least one of the following roles:
# - Organization Owner
# - Project Owner
# 
# To learn more, see [Organization, Project, and Database Access Overview](https://docs.couchbase.com/cloud/organizations/organization-projects-overview.html).
#

body.description: application/json: schema: type: object, required: name, properties: name: type: string, description: The new project name (up to 128 characters)., maxLength: 128, example: My-New-Project, description: type: string, description: The new project description (up to 256 characters)., maxLength: 256, example: The extended description of my awesome project.

projectId.description: The GUID4 ID of the project.

organizationId.description: The GUID4 ID of the organization.

If_Match.description: A precondition header that specifies the entity tag of a resource.

function.name: delete_deleteprojectbyid
function.description:
Deletes an existing project.
# 
# In order to access this endpoint, the provided API key must have at least one of the following roles:
# - Organization Owner
# - Project Owner
# 
# To learn more, see [Organization, Project, and Database Access Overview](https://docs.couchbase.com/cloud/organizations/organization-projects-overview.html).
#

projectId.description: The GUID4 ID of the project.

organizationId.description: The GUID4 ID of the organization.
